long_description: The Lafuma Low Elips chair reclines to 5 different positions to ensure you're comfortable while lounging at the campsite or on the back deck. Pick the reclined position that you find most comfortable by simply adjusting the armrests. Batyline(R) mesh fabric stands up to UV radiation, resists mold and withstands regular use in the outdoors. Lightweight aluminum frame won't corrode or rust. The Lafuma Low Elips chair folds flat for easy storage and transportation.
short_description: The Lafuma Low Elips chair reclines to 5 different positions to ensure you're comfortable while lounging at the campsite or on the back deck.
